block.text1_ru: Si Franc is a company that seeks to be a trusted partner for its clients in the real estate world.
block.text1_ro: Si Franc is a company that seeks to be a trusted partner for its clients in the real estate world.
block.text2_ru: The project that aspires to be an ally for its clients in the real estate world. To represent this vision, we created a modern, minimalist brand that showcases a feeling of elegance for the future.
block.text2_ro: The project that aspires to be an ally for its clients in the real estate world. To represent this vision, we created a modern, minimalist brand that showcases a feeling of elegance for the future.

block2.desc_ru: At Creative Studio, we believe that every project is unique and requires a personalized approach. That's why we take the time to understand our clients' goals and objectives before creating a customized plan to achieve them. Whether it's a logo design, website development, or a complete branding overhaul, we work closely with our clients throughout the entire process to ensure that their vision is brought to life.

target.desc_ru: Si Franc wanted to be seen as a powerful, respected, yet close, trustworthy partner. We were looking for a mixture future and reflects itself as someone you can count.
